about.title: Ugarit: Rebuilding Finance from its First Home
about.content1: In the heart of modern Syria lies the cradle of economics—the ancient city of Ugarit. It was here that commerce, communication, and record-keeping converged to build one of the world's first great trading hubs. Today, from this same land, Ugarit rises again.
about.content2:
We are not just another finance app.
We are a revival.
about.content3: Ugarit is built on a simple, powerful belief: the tools for financial security and empowerment should be available to everyone, everywhere—starting with our home.
about.content4: Ugarit is built for all. For the busy professional in Damascus, the student in Aleppo, the saver in Latakia, and the entrepreneur looking towards the future. We are here to simplify the complex, secure the vulnerable, and empower the ambitious.
about.pillars: Why Ugarit? The Pillars of Our Promise
about.security_desc: Military-grade encryption ensuring your assets are protected with the highest security standards.
about.control_desc: Seamless experience for instant transfers and managing all financial activity in one place.
about.insight_desc: AI-powered financial insights to help you understand spending and grow your savings.
about.content5: Ugarit is the vision of a single founder, driven by the potential of their homeland. It is a project born from the belief that Syria's next chapter can be written with innovation and hope.
about.content6: This is more than a launch; it's the first step in rebuilding a financial ecosystem for a new generation.
